name: places/ChIJ1_H65xH2wokRx04Armg0RDw
formattedAddress: 160 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 160 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10026-1319, USA

originalText.text: Not good. This place is either completely incompetent and unhelpful, or they flat out stole my pain medication or misplaced it and lied about it saying I had already picked it up. After arguing on the phone with them multiple times, having my doctors jump through hoops to loophole with insurance to re-prescribe , and filing a police report, they magically had my medication all of a sudden. They also said they called me days ago to report they had made a mistake and I said “okay great” on the phone …they never called me and certainly didn’t speak to me. Once again, they either lied or called the wrong person. Whether it’s ignorance or thievery, that’s not who I want handling my prescriptions. Thanks for adding more stress on top of a difficult and painful surgery during the holidays.

originalText.text: My favorite pharmacy ever. David the pharmacist is thoughtful and kind. The staff is superb. The wait for prescriptions is never more than a few minutes: a miracle! I get my vaccines and flu shots here too. Can't recommend highly enough

text.text: My favorite pharmacy ever. David the pharmacist is thoughtful and kind. The staff is superb. The wait for prescriptions is never more than a few minutes: a miracle! I get my vaccines and flu shots here too. Can't recommend highly enough

originalText.text: I had never used a smaller, non-chain pharmacy and was blown away by Malcolm Pharmacy's attention & action when my doctor's office sent instructions off to wrong locations. During CoVid when all doctors are working remotely and your doctor's office has you on hold for 40min waiting to speak to anyone. After 5 days of my Dr's office continuing to make errors and cross wires,  it only took Malcolm Pharmacy 1 day to fix it - which meant Malcolm Pharmacy had to make those calls and wait. And, they didn't even know me yet - I was a new client. I received call backs from the Pharmacy daily and I was impressed at how they asked questions to make sure my meds did not interact negatively. THANK YOU SO MUCH. This kind of responsible and proactive attitude is harder and harder to find.

originalText.text: Great Pharmacy. I've been a.customer for several years. I appreciate my pharmacist David, for he is so very helpful and that's a good thing. I can rest assured that medications needed are there. David's care and concern is just what a person need! Thanks David.

originalText.text: This is the best pharmacy I've ever used. Friendly, helpful staff who will go out of their way to make sure everything tip top. Highly recommended, especially if you've never tried a local pharmacy, as I hadn't until Malcolm.
